#include<stdio.h>
#include<strings.h>
#define getstr scanf("%s",s); i=strlen(s);while(i--)
int main(){
    int t;int i;
    char s[500005];
    int a[30];
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
        getstr
        a[s[i]-'a']++;
        getstr
        a[s[i]-'a']--;
        for(i=97-'a';i<='z'-'a';i++)
                if(a[i]!=0)
                    {printf("NO\n");goto end;}
        printf("YES\n");
        end:;
    }
}
